Plot: A young, recently-orphaned girl is sent to England after living in India all her life. Once there, she begins to explore her new, seemingly-isolated surroundings -- and its secrets.
Actors: Kate Maberly, Heydon Prowse, Andrew Knott, Maggie Smith
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 5 nominations.
Title: The Secret Garden
